lines.text: I hope I'm not disturbing you so late at night.
Nobody's ever caught me at it.
Look, this is a bad time.
That's okay, I've got bad news.
That's toilet paper, buster. That ain't enough for a tip for my mass-oosie. Don't you know that Donny owes me close to two hundred grand? That's three zeroes with a TWO in front.
She's a Cocker Spaniel and a Poodle. Some call her Cockerpoo... but I call her Spadoodle.
